entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Fucking liar, everyone saw the briefing. If you think people will believe that, then you're more stupid than I give you credit for. VOTE HIM OUT before he kills all of you... like he has the country!
https://t.co/9FALLPRk9v
